reviewText:
I remembered this movie my whole life- and I only watched it a couple of times as a little kid.

I spent a lot of time searching for this movie, and so I was SO excited to find it here!

The DVD quality is very good, the movie itself totally holds up and it is really awesome to find a kid's movie that isn't scary (like Disney)!!

The child I bought this for loves it too---it's the movie most requested.  So, this is highly recommended!
Looking for the Video for 5 years ,it was in top condition ,and we will enjoy many hours of fun , and relive a childhood experience .
